SELECT H.HISTORY_NO AS HISTORY_NO, H.CUST_NUMBER AS CUST_NUMBER, -- ✅ 추가 H.COUPON_NO AS COUPON_NO, C.COUPON_TYPE AS COUPON_TYPE, C.COUPON_NAME AS COUPON_NAME, M.NAME AS ISSUER, -- ✅ 고객 이름을 임시로 issuer에 출력 C.STATUS AS STATUS, H.ISSUE_DATE AS ISSUE_DATE, H.USE_DATE AS USE_DATE FROM COUPON_HISTORY H JOIN COUPON C ON H.COUPON_NO = C.COUPON_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON H.CUST_NUMBER = M.CUST_NUMBER ORDER BY H.HISTORY_NO DESC
